Get an Award-winning Design & Development Team, On-demand

Building highly-polished digital products that transform business and accelerate the speed of innovation.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_button button_url=”/contact/” button_text=”Let’s Get Started” _builder_version=”3.19.7″ custom_button=”on” button_text_color=”#ffffff” button_bg_use_color_gradient=”on” button_bg_color_gradient_start=”#5DE455″ button_bg_color_gradient_end=”#14C0AA” button_bg_color_gradient_direction=”210deg” button_border_width=”0px” button_letter_spacing=”1px” button_font=”|600||on|||||” button_use_icon=”off” custom_margin=”64px||” custom_padding=”20px|72px|20px|72px” box_shadow_style=”preset1″ box_shadow_vertical=”26px” box_shadow_blur=”92px” box_shadow_spread=”3px” box_shadow_color=”rgba(0,0,0,0.2)” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_button][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.13.0″ _module_preset=”default” min_height=”4px” custom_css_main_element=”font-weight: 600;||font-size: 20px;||line-height: 28px;||letter-spacing: 0.888889px;||color: #27283C;||padding-top:100px;” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_css_main_element_last_edited=”on|tablet” custom_css_main_element_tablet=”margin-top:300px;” custom_css_main_element_phone=”margin-top:300px;”]

Trusted by great companies

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_code _builder_version=”4.13.0″ _module_preset=”default” custom_css_main_element=”padding-bottom:80px;” global_colors_info=”{}”]

[/et_pb_code][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.13.0″ _module_preset=”default” background_color=”#27283c” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.13.0″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.13.0″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.13.0″ _module_preset=”default” custom_css_main_element=”color:#fff;” global_colors_info=”{}”]

But how do we do it?

Here’s an overview of our process that will take your brand to the next level.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.13.0″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.13.0″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_code _builder_version=”4.13.0″ _module_preset=”default” hover_enabled=”0″ global_colors_info=”{}” sticky_enabled=”0″]

  • Discovery workshop

    Discuss your goals, determine success metrics, identify problems to solve and define visitors of the website. This can take place in-person or virtually.

  • UX design + content strategy

    Design wireframes for the entire website to map out key customer journeys and understand what content will be needed to communicate your product or service.

  • Visual design + branding

    Define visual direction of the website and translate the wireframes into high-fidelity designs that successfully communicate your company’s brand and product or service.

  • Webflow development

    Build out the high-fidelity designs into a custom Webflow website & web design system. We then integrate Webflow’s CMS to enable easy updates to the website.

  • Webflow onboarding

    Provide you with a 1-on-1 training session and a library of personalised tutorials so that you are well equipped to take control of your website.

[/et_pb_code][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.13.0″ _module_preset=”default” background_image=”https://www.brightscout.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/11/ornament-right.png” background_size=”contain” background_position=”center_right” custom_padding=”||4px|||” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.13.0″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.13.0″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.13.0″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Our Work

Phylum

Philum is an early stage start-up developing DevSecOps tooling to help developers identify and mitigate risk stemming.

We have defined a collaborative process with our clients. Let’s see if we are a fit.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.13.0″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”2_5,3_5″ _builder_version=”4.13.0″ _module_preset=”default” custom_padding=”90px|||||” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”2_5″ _builder_version=”4.13.0″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_image src=”https://www.brightscout.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/11/illustration-faq-1.png” title_text=”illustration faq 1″ _builder_version=”4.13.0″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”3_5″ _builder_version=”4.13.0″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_accordion _builder_version=”4.13.0″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_accordion_item title=”How we can start a project together?” open=”on” _builder_version=”4.13.0″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Great question! The first step is to get in touch by filling out our contact form, which you’ll find here. We usually start our projects with a discovery call, followed by a short exploration phase where we work with you to define the project scope and services we can help you with. We’ll then proceed to share our cost estimate, prepare a statement of work and schedule in kickoff calls with our teams.
